Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Using GenAI I didn't have to wait for feedback, also using GenAI I didn't have to feel bad for using up a teacher's valuable time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI made me feel more confident in myself as it gave me a lot more positive feedback whereas teachers typically only highlight negative things making me feel bad about my work.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI typically provided a more in depth and longer analyses of my work but often missed areas critical for the task as it is not familiar with the content of the unit. Whereas the teacher typically provided a short, summary of areas done wrong which was well aligned with the content that needed to be known.
